author: odeakin
msg: Creation of jar files will throw OutOfMemoryException when compressing large files. Change the compression of files to use a 1024 byte buffer size (same as in the decompression code) instead of attempting to allocate the full file size.

author: eevans
msg: Patch by Stu Hood; reviewed by eevans for CASSANDRA-1554
